Get states geographic boundaries

Source: R/tract.R
s2_states.Rd

Get states geographic boundaries

Usage

s2_states(year = as.character(2010:2023))

Arguments

year

character data year passed to tigris to get tract boundaries

Examples

s2_states(year = "2020")
